item.title: Here's What's New In Go 1.10
item.description: Go 1.8 is one year old (Happy belated Birthday ðŸŽŠ ðŸŽ‰) Go 1.9 is already 6 months old! Go 1.10 is out âœŒ The latest Go release, v1.10 arrived six months after V1.9. This release was stated in the change-logs and the Go blog. I’m gonna share some interesting changes I’ve found in Go 1.10 with you. New Features The Language Go 1.10 offers compiler tool chain and performance improvements, but no significant changes was made to the language’s specification.
